text: Bona (abahanahanisi) baya kukhwaza (abakholwayo) bathi: “Sasingekunyanga nani na?” Abakholwayo baya kuthi: “Ewe, kodwa nina nazithuthumbisa ngokwenu, nilindele (ilishwa phezu kwethu1) neengcinga zeminqweno yenu zanimfamekisa kwada kwafika umyalelo ka-Allâh. Kwaye umkhohlisi (uSathana) wanikhohlisa ngoAllâh
